title: Modern two story loft with open concept layout
posting_body: This 2BD, 3BA corner unit faces West and is on the top floor with only one shared wall.
First level offers open concept living/dining areas, allowing natural light to fill the space.
Kitchen features stainless amenities, ample storage, and large island with seating.
Enjoy the SoCal weather from one of two balconies in the unit - one on the first level and the second in the primary suite.
To request a showing please reply with the date and time you would like to see the unit and the best number / email to contact you so we can confirm the appointment.
